metadata.name: Kwame of the Eshun
metadata.description:
INTRO
Joshua was the first creator to receive a full-length feature in Midjourney Magazine. This image was the first one displayed in that feature, on page 48 of Issue #1.

This is an NFT that can be used for multiple games, including an avatar for an alternate reality game in development. By using this avatar, you will play as the ESHUN tribe.

DESCRIPTION
O, Eshun, tie ns…õm a meto

Kwame is a musician known for helping the Eshun find a renewed sense of purpose and hope during their great drought.

THEME
Joshua's work is about the most futuristic concept of today: hope. It's inspired by two melting pots, his church and artist community, which are home to refugees, artists of every medium, plus many races and socioeconomic groups.

COLLECTION
Created for the AI Surrealism exhibition at Oculus World Trade Center NYC, hosted by Superchief Gallery NFT and Exquisite Workers. The largest AI art show in history, featuring 100 AI artists, June 2-8, 2023. Curated by Anna Dart üùÆ Roger Haus.
